dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
The GNU Scientific Library (GSL) is a numerical library for C and C++
programmers. It is free software under the GNU General Public License.
The library provides a wide range of mathematical routines such as
random number generators, special functions and least-squares fitting.
There are over 1000 functions in total with an extensive test suite.
dependencies.name: gsl

dependencies.description: Multiple independent streams of pseudo-random numbers.
dependencies.name: rngstreams

dependent_to.description: ROOT is a data analysis framework.
dependent_to.name: root

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Use random number generators from GNU Scientific Library
variants.name: gsl

variants.description: Use RNGSTREAM library for uniform random generation
variants.name: rngstreams

variants.description: Enable the build of shared libraries
variants.name: shared
